meanings.definition: To determine or express the quantity of something.
meanings.sent1: She quantitated the number of apples in the basket.
meanings.sent2: The scientist quantitated the volume of liquid in the beaker.
meanings.sent3: He quantitated the amount of time he spent waiting in line.
meanings.sent4: The teacher quantitated the level of understanding in her students.
meanings.sent5: The chef quantitated the ingredients for the recipe to perfection.

meanings.definition: To measure or calculate the amount of something.
meanings.sent1: They quantitated the distance between the two buildings.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist quantitated the dosage of the medication.
meanings.sent3: The gardener quantitated the sunlight each plant received.
meanings.sent4: The accountant quantitated the expenses for the month.
meanings.sent5: The tailor quantitated the fabric needed for the dress.
